text: How would you describe this person right now?
When you need to share a personal secret, how likely are you to choose them?
When you're upset, how often do you seek their support?
How much friendly physical contact do you have?
Do your close friends or family know this person?
How do you usually handle disagreements together?
How many shared routines or activities do you already have?
Would you like to spend more one-on-one time together?
Would you like your relationship to feel more defined or official?
Would you like to talk about deeper feelings with them?
Would you like more hugging or hand-holding?
Are you open to going on dates together?
If it felt mutual and comfortable, would you want to kiss them?
Would you consider exploring sexual intimacy in the future?
Would you like to introduce each other to close friends or family?
Would you like to plan a trip or project together?
Can you imagine living under the same roof someday?
